title: M-Wing
wikitext:
[[File:m-wing.jpg|500px|thumb|right]] '''Model''': BTL-A1 M-wing (Quasar)
'''Designer and manufacturer''': Koensayr
'''Type''': Long range / reconnaissance fighter
'''Scale''': Starfighter
'''Length''': 13 m
'''Skill''': Starfighter Piloting: M-wing
'''Crew''': 1, '''gunner''': 1
'''Crew Skills''': Astrogation 3D+2, Starfighter Piloting 4D+2, Starship Gunnery 4D+2, Starship Shields 3D
'''Cargo Capacity''': 80 kg
'''Consumables''': One month
'''Cost''': 60,000 credits (used)
'''Hyperdrive Multiplier''': x1
'''Hyperdrive Backup''': No
'''Nav Computer''': Yes
'''Maneuverability''': 3D
'''Space''': 6
'''Atmosphere''': 330; 950 km/h
'''Hull''': 3D
'''Shields''': 1D
'''Sensors''':
*Passive: 40 / 0D *Search: 70 / 1D
*Scan: 80 / 2D
*Focus: 4 / 3D
'''Weapons''':
*'''Laser Cannon''' : Fire Arc: Front
Crew: Pilot
Skill: Starship Gunnery
Fire Control: 3D
Space Range: 1-3 / 12 / 25
Atmosphere Range: 100-300 / 1.2 / 2.5 km
Damage: 5D
*'''Light Ion Cannon''' : Fire Arc: Front
Crew: 1 (copilot)
Skill: Starship Gunnery
Fire Control: 3D (1D if used by pilot)
Space Range: 1-3 / 7 / 36
Atmosphere Range: 100-300 / 700 / 3.6 km
Damage: 4D '''Capsule''': A totally unknown model by Koensayr, designed before their most renowned model the Y-Wing Longprobe. The M-Wing lacks the Y-Wing's adaptability, but compensates it with it's better maneuverability, although at the expense of hull and shields. Not more than 100,000 units were made, and finding a working unit in the Galaxy requires lots of patience.
